website_summaries.verdict: Made of stainless steel and brass, this bidet and diaper cleaner system is almost as easy to install as it is to use.
pros: Stainless-steel, lead-free brass fixture with adjustable pressure
Attach to toilet bowl or side wall by standard toilet
Includes lead-free brass T-valve, sprayer, hose, hook, and hanger
Adjustable water pressure and pivoting nozzle
cons: Be sure to turn off the valve to de-pressurize after each use

customer_reviews.title: I loved this produce when I first bought it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this produce when I first bought it. It worked well and looked like it was high quality. Within 4 months of buying it though, the sprayer tubing had broken down and suddenly started leaking water all over the restroom. Luckily I was home to shut off the water before a disaster broke out. Regardless, not sure if the unit I received was the exception, but it's concerning since this could have been a total disaster costing thousands of dollars to fix if I wasn't home. Wouldn't recommend based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: There should be better description on the item
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for me but I had to install it ASAP for I needed it for guest with baby visiting us. The fittings that go in the main line are too large for US. They are meant, maybe, for Europe or Asia. I spent $20.00 to purchase 2 adapters and 1 junction just to be able to install it without the shut off valve that arrived with the set.. There should be better description on the item, like the thread size of the fittings.
customer_reviews.author: L1A1

customer_reviews.title: Cloth diaper helper
customer_reviews.text: We got this in hopes of making our cloth diapering easier. With two kids in diapers we needed something that would help aid in cleaning off as much of the diapers as possible. After much research we ended up ordering this one and we were not disappointed. It works extremely well and it was super easy to install. There have been no leaks what's so ever and we are seriously considering buying another one for our other restrooms because it's also handy for when we use the restroom :)
customer_reviews.author: Neighber

customer_reviews.title: Some serious shortcomings
customer_reviews.text: 3 basic flaws. 1) The on/off lever has to be in the middle to have maximum spray. Impossible to judge this. Other similar devices are on maximum when fully in the down position. 2) The hanger doesn't fit the tank at all. It flops around, making the nozzle very difficult to lift out. 3) The sprayer has a rubber o-ring that binds to the hanger, even with oil, making it even more difficult to remove the nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water leaking in wate flow pipe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product but within 60 days water leaking from silver covered pipe . My bathroom watered and flow to my ceiling. It started May be at night I saw morning my ground floor water and water dripping from ceiling.I checked all connections and no water leaking any junction. Water flow pipe very poor quality. I needed to repair my calling wet area near about 1000 usd cost. I don’t recommend anybody to buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Mamun

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, solid parts, works well
customer_reviews.text: We finally just started using this as a diaper sprayer. My husband hooked it up in about 5 minutes - really easy. It allows you to have water flowing to just the toilet, just the sprayer, or both at once. It feels like a heavy, nice quality. I'm glad we paid a few extra dollars for stainless steel instead of plastic parts. The pressure is pretty good for getting poop chunks off diapers - right now baby is EBF, but it's gotten chunkier. Overall nice quality, easy to install and use. I wouldn't use it as a bidet sprayer at least in winter cause the water is freezing! But it might work for that in summer time.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: Aaqu Nexis bidet sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I just installed the unit. Easy 5 minutes or less. The quality of the components are excellent. trigger could be more ergonomic. The biggest downside is that you are supposed to shut off the t valve after each use. Totally inconvenient! Also, the valve should have 3 positions so the water to the toilet should they on. Will see how it works out in every day use. I may put the holder in a fixed position on the wall, so it is easier to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Majewski

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement, product page says 5 year warranty, ...
customer_reviews.text: False advertisement, product page says 5 year warranty, the box clearly states only 1 year warranty. I didn't notice this in the first pic of the product until I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Low water Flow and low quality
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write reviews but this bidet was just bad. I bought 2 of these and had a handyman install them. The water flow is bad. The knob that supposed to control the off and on switch doesn’t work , so you have to put it in the middle so you can get water flow. The second one came with missing parts and my handyman pointed out that it looked like a used or returned product as it had scratches all over it. I made the handyman wait and ran over to Home depot and purchased 2 stainless steel bidets that work really well. Never purchase bidet on amazon again. Bad quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE of this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this bidet about 2 years ago. Last Monday morning, the rubber supply hose to the bidet developed a tear and flooded my second floor bathroom. The water seeped and accumulated into the ceiling. Ceiling came crushing down with the water and flooded my dining and living rooms. This incident happened early Monday morning. We have this water damage now that we have to deal with which will cause us thousands of dollars. That's the truth about this product that really is very hard to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with quality
customer_reviews.text: After about 6 months of use, the casing around the pipe came off and one day the pipe burst flooding the bathroom. Now i have to closely monitor the other installed bidets to see if the casing comes off. Is there a better bidet around? Don’t know.
customer_reviews.author: Kavita Bopardikar

customer_reviews.title: Great tool when there is a demand for toilet paper
customer_reviews.text: Installation took about 30 min for me and was simple. I had a leak when I first installed it. I was worried i made some thing wrong but after verifying the manual I just re-tightened it and it stopped leaking. Over all its worked out pretty good so far. I got the items delivered on time nicely packed without any damages. Rubber handle grip is an outstanding feature i liked when compared to other amazon listed items. I may probably get a second for the other toilet room.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul Qadir Aslam

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Pivot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because it said it 360 Degree Pivoting Nozzle. It does not. The hose is just under 4' long. So it makes harder to twist because it doesn't pivot, and too short to really use it. Good quality, but now I'll have to spend more money and buy a longer hose.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Conroy

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I have searched and sea bred for the best external toilet bidet, I have tried multiple companies as well. But let me tell you, although this product isn't one of the priciest ones, it's on the cheaper side, yet it is absolute quality! The pressure is perfect, easy to install, and doesn't leak and can handle it. I bought this product around 6 months ago, I'm loving it and I'm at ease cause it's covered for the next 5 years. Which is a lot. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Works great once you get it installed.
customer_reviews.text: It works great post-J-pouch surgery. I would give it 5 stars except it took my friend most of 2 days to install it so it would work, toilet would flush and toilet wouldn't continue to fill. She looked and found the right connectors in the house and didn't need a trip to Home Depot like she thought. I couldn't have installed it myself. We have new toilets, installed last year, so it might be more difficult for others.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: What a great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the master bath in the apartment we are renting in FL. Did not want to spend a lot of money but wanted to have the convenience of a sprayer. This works great. The plumber who installed it was impressed with the quality compared to other products he has installed. It only took him a few minutes to put in. If my husband had tried, it could have done it, but he was out enjoyed golf! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Leaked all over our bathroom.. we don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: We loved it at first until it flooded our bathroom. Apparently we either use the flush or use it. If we use both at the same time without doing any adjustment it will start to leak and eventually lead to a flood. For that reason. I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: I'm surprised to write that I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised to write that I love this product. I wouldn't have thought I would use it so much. We originally bought it for cloth diaper use and it worked wonderful for that purpose. It cleans up poo cloth diapers much easier than any other method. Now we use it for personal toilet time clean up and will keep using it for years to come. It's easy to control the handle and flow and we are able to say goodbye to butt wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Hopegrounded

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and gentle pressure
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to install and had it all connected in 15 minutes without issues or leaks. Helps to have an adjustable wrench for additional tightening. The handle allows you to modulate pressure and you can adjust pressure further by using the main T-valve lever. This unit is decided better than other brands we have tried that only allowed full blast operation. We like this unit so much that we have ordered a second unit for the spare bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hoang

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these in 2016. We have them installed in each bathroom of the house. The instructions were easy to follow and the install was very straightforward. They continue to function with no issues. The chrome finish is still like new and the functionality is 100%. I recommend without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: it broke!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a diaper sprayer that could make it easy to wash after using bathroom and still be safe!this one is easy to use but the quality is poor! after a while of using , the part that helps you to close the water coming from tank which is recommend by factory for safety, broke ! so we cant shout the water from down the hose and there is a big chance of leaking and damaging!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation & worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these a few months ago, and they've worked great so far. Installation was easy and didn't take more than 10 minutes for each. This is nothing fancy. Looks clean and simple. The instructions state that you should turn off the valve when the bidet sprayer is not in use, but I just leave it on. No leaks, no problems. Note: The screws for wall-mounting are not provided with the product, so if you plan to mount this on the wall be sure to have the hardware for it.
customer_reviews.author: Giriesh

customer_reviews.title: A must have for every home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my visiting parents, this is an excellent quality product. the setup was very easy (too about 8-10 mins). The water pressure can be adjusted to suite the requirement. Highly recommended. On the side note. I wonder why bidet sprayer is not widely used in USA. This is normal in Asian countries and is very easy to use :-).
customer_reviews.author: vivek

customer_reviews.title: It is necessary!
customer_reviews.text: You can easily install it. You never need a plumber, and it's very useful because you do not need much toilet paper, I don't know why this doesn't use everywhere in the US!
customer_reviews.author: Dlawar

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sprayer to have for cloth diapering. The install was very easy and it works very well. The pressure adjusts depending on how hard you squeeze the handle. The clip for the tank didn't fit my toilet, but I was able to hook it behind the backsplash on my sink so I didn't have to drill any holes to mount it. I love that it's all stainless steel. Works great for hosing poop off into the toilet, and it will also come in handy for postpartum recovery when we have our second child. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Honeybee Lady

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I got along for 59 years without it.
customer_reviews.text: Married ladies; you HAVE to have this. No joke and I'm not getting paid to write this review. It is easy to install and easy to use. If you adjust it correctly you can keep on at all the times. Or turn it on and off with just a flip of the knob. I like it so much I've started giving them as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: bswtwa

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: after buying 2 bidets from a different manufacturer which were hard to install because we need extra pieces to purchase for compatibility. Bought this bidet in february 2017 - glad we found this one, it is easy to install, good quality and does its purpose. Planning to buy 2 more
customer_reviews.author: rapamala

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about couple of months now and it's a great product. It is stainless steel as stated and all the parts are made well, nothing cheap about them. Installation was easy though I'd recommend using a wrench despite instructions saying it's not required. I had an issue with one of the sprayers (I bought 3) and it was resolved immediately! Overall it's a great product. I'll update in a few months to say how it's held on to regular use.
customer_reviews.author: rajhans16

customer_reviews.title: Clean Bum
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product for cleaning your dirty reusable diapers, or other bits in your nether regions. The only thing I have to use TP now is for drying out. The terminal orifice of my alimentary canal now feels the cleanest ever. I also love that it is stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Trapspringer

customer_reviews.title: Best Sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and appearance. The hose is metal reinforced. This makes it very flexible. I have had the plastic hoses in the past and they get stiff and are hard to use. This one is a pleasure to use and should last a very long time. It also comes with a nice metal hose hanger. It has a lip that you could hang over a vanity door if you mounted it inside or you can take the hanger part off like I did by removing two screws and mounting it directly onto the wall. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cloth diaper sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Our second toilet sprayer, for rinsing out cloth diapers. Steel construction feels much more durable than our last, plastic one. But even with the plastic one, it was the hose that broke before the handle. If I had of seen this one, I would have bought it as our first. Turn it off and depressurize it when you're done using it.
customer_reviews.author: Clatterbuck Family

customer_reviews.title: stainless hand held bidet
customer_reviews.text: These are handy hoses if you're into a cleaner behind... A couple of things... it's just a hose you hook up to the water - so there is no heat. So... if you're a tough guy... it's cool. Literally. Easy to set up with minimal plumbing knowledge. I will update this review should new info seem useful.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great hand held bidet. Much like the system I was introduced to in India. Pretty easy to install but I did need to buy an new flexible tube since mine was very stiff and wouldn't bend properly but that won't be an issue for most people. Good stream of water you can control with the handle. Not exactly the true bidet experience but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pena

customer_reviews.title: works great just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, works really great. You can adjust water flow gentle to hard by gently pushing sprayer on handle. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandilee4u

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience
customer_reviews.text: Suppoeed to be new. Came in a plastic bag full of water, not its original box. Came already used, scratched, wet,hose full of water. Very disappointing and disgusting, looks like they took out from others' butt and delivered to me. Returning it
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought a cheap bidet before that one. It wore out just few months and leaks. Decided to buy a Bidet with a better quality. So tried that bidet and think I can return if it doesn't work well. No problem to set up, feel it is a good quality will last long. After a month, it still works fine without problem.
customer_reviews.author: dnschan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good one. Completely satisfied. We had a different model in our old house. When we moved to a new house, we tried this one , and then ordered two more for all the bathrooms. There was a mess up with the price in amazon with the promotion code, but the customer service was quick to resolve. Good.
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: easy to install, works well.
customer_reviews.text: product came as described. instructions were included and were clear with pictures. installed both very easily and have no experience with plumbing or installing anything really. works as it should. first toilet had leaks and required adjustment to find the right position but it eventually fit. second toilet was easy, instant success. have been satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cairee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t smear! Wash!
customer_reviews.text: I used similar items for years, so far - this is the best! When I got it I faced a small delivery problem, which they solved immediately. It is a great pleasure when you meet quality and great service! I recommend this item with all my heart as the best I have ever used. Five stars an understatement. It is essential for your healt! Don’t smear! Wash!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Avi Eilam Amzallag

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to install it because in any scenario there was a water lick.
customer_reviews.author: Rihanna BATENI

customer_reviews.title: Great product, works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Made my life easy. Comes with detailed instructions that are easy to follow. The package had multiple valves of different sizes that ensures it'll fit any outlet. Quality product and total value for money. Also, less paper means more environment friendly.
customer_reviews.author: HSanghvi

customer_reviews.title: Good sprayer!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a year now PROS - The bidet sprayer is good - Easy to install - Pressure can be controlled by the main knob only - Easy to use - Comes with several washers (just in case) CONS - none
customer_reviews.author: Rliwma

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought had a pinhole leak in the metal and flooded my bathroom floor. I had to have it removed. I bought a second thinking there's no way two could leak. And now the second one leaks. I will be returning that. But I had to pay for installation of each time.
customer_reviews.author: Corinthia Kotlar

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should and without leaking.
customer_reviews.text: Washes reusable diapers like a champ, and the on/off valve built in is actually really useful since it seems reduce the toilets efficiency when left open. No sign of leaks and just all around effective, can't complain. Review Update: Almost a year has gone by and still no leaks. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: W. Giant

customer_reviews.title: Solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Been using it a lot for diapers. Works great, looks great, and good pressure. I wish full "on" was not at a 45 degree angle. I always have to press the button and then turn the nob to find max pressure. Also, recommends you always keep it turned off when not in use. That's okay but I wish they would make these like the kitchen sink sprays that are always ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Anteater

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Use it for keeping bottom clean. Works wonders. Also use it to clean toilet when needed. Great product buy one you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Ann Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product and Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This product is a savior! I got it a day late, but it is the courrier's fault not the seller! It is as described, has a great quality and what has amazed me that you can contol the water pressure. Thank you very much for providing this product!
customer_reviews.author: Salma A. Felimban

customer_reviews.title: Quality Peoduct
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I just followed the instructions and it took only five minutes. No leaks or any other problems. The product is made with quality materials, looks nice, and works great. I ordered another one for our second bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: M. Raja

customer_reviews.title: An added luxury for any bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Love this bidet. I took a trip to Thailand and found myself using this sprayer everywhere we went. I find it really useful keeping the kids cleaner as well.
customer_reviews.author: HBK

customer_reviews.title: Down with toilet paper!
customer_reviews.text: Ass has never been fresher! Also saving around $300/yr in t.p., so that’s an added bonus! Truthfully this is my second one I’ve purchased, and I’ll probably be ordering a third for my garage bathroom, so I’ll always have the cleanest bum no matter where I’m at.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas L Morse

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation and works great
customer_reviews.text: We bought two Aqua Nexis sprayers and it took less than 5 min/each for the installation. So far, both of them are working great. Although, I wish there was a way to control the water speed/pressure but overall, we are satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shah

customer_reviews.title: The bidet sprayer is good but the T-Valve is defective
customer_reviews.text: The bidet sprayer is good but the T-Valve was defective as the water was leaking from it. I had to buy another T-Valve (i.e.., Luxe Metal T-adapter with Shut-off Valve) separately in order to stop that leak. The customer service was great, though. They have generously issued a refund to what I paid for the new T-Valve.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn_User

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around for handheld bidets and most of them were plastic made to look like metal. The Aqua Nexis is solid steel and so easy to install. Live the way it works. The only product improvement could be some rubber dampers on the bracket that sits on the tank. The ends of the two screws rub against the toilet tank. Other than that it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Happy

customer_reviews.title: excellent introductions on how to install not that difficult
customer_reviews.text: Loooove it! excellent introductions on how to install not that difficult. Only thing you really need is plumber tape. At first it was leaking because the knob is suppose to be at an angle but once i read the instruction correctly instead of quickly everything went smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: sarahclarkson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !!
customer_reviews.text: Very valuable, works fabulously - everyone asks me about them when they use em in my loo, have recommended them to all! Easy to install, spray well...every bathroom should be equipped with these!!!
customer_reviews.author: UQ

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough for a college kid with no plumbing experience to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, took under 10min and I have no experience with plumbing. I barely even used the instructions. No leaks or water issues thus far. Didn’t need to buy any special tape or a new t-valve(?).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love love this bidet
customer_reviews.text: I love love this bidet. It is easier to use than the seat bidet and keep toilet area clean. Husband installed it in less that 5 minutes. All parts are metal so hope it will last for long.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mwangi

customer_reviews.title: Cleanliness
customer_reviews.text: Bought back in 2017 and it still functions as intended. I like that it's stainless steel and not the cheap plastic type that other vendors are selling. Pressure is fine and cleans perfectly! Definitely recommend anyone to have as an addition to their home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A definite add-on for better hygiene
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these (and two years later got two extra toilets), they are very easy to install. You can hang the sprayer directly to the back of the toilet tank. Simple, genius add on.
customer_reviews.author: ABG

customer_reviews.title: Sealing tape needed!
customer_reviews.text: It has worked great for the first 2 weeks and then I saw a huge leak due to the fact that one of the sealing washers was damaged over the time. I had to use sealing tape for that and it is working great so far. Please be prepared in advance.
customer_reviews.author: morteza

customer_reviews.title: Beaware !! Hose start leaking and flooded the restroom.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item less than a year ago and the the hose start leaking all of a sudden and flooded the whole restroom. By reading earlier reviews it looks like it is a common issue with the hose of this product. Be careful if you are using this product and going on vacation with nobody at home. Your house can be flooded.
customer_reviews.author: Salman K.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you're able to turn off your water.
customer_reviews.text: I installed two of these. But one is now leaking from the sprayer end. It's a small leak, but over night I do see a puddle of water in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Adeel

customer_reviews.title: A great product.
customer_reviews.text: simple to install. great for spraying all sorts of things, including but not limited to bottoms! will probably get a second for the other toilet room.
customer_reviews.author: Tastychop

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I had installed a plastic one that looked like steel before this, This is ez to install and control the water flow
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quality product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and simple to use. I bought it as a diaper sprayer for my cloth diapers and it has been perfect. I also like that you can turn the sprayer off, as I have other small children who I know would use it as a hose for the bathroom floor! Overall a great product, good quality, easy to use and install, very glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaM

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these. Great construction. The valve and nozzle are both constructed from metal and feels great in hand. I had to get a replacement valve for my 2nd kit as I couldn't get a good seal with it. But they sent me another one immediately and it's perfect. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Comfortable to hold, squeezes without much effort. Brushed aluminum finish is great and the stream is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Arcticwynd

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought one a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and works great. Puts out plenty of pressure. I have had hemorrhoid problem and my doc recommended getting one. Have had it for a few weeks and feeling good works great without any leaks to note
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: This product design is flawed. Water leak from the spray head
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with this product. It started leaking out from the head of the spray in few months impacting by first floor ceiling. This is the second time...
customer_reviews.author: Khais Khan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Works like a charm! I used to own a similar bidet but the hose was stiff. The hose on this one is so flexible and you can tell the quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great Bidet
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Installation was quick and it is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: lightlo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product till now, unlike all the bidets we bought before and lasted a month or two at max, very flexible hose, wish it was a bit longer. The sprayer is perfect, it sprays gently, it won't give that crazy sudden spray of water when you use it. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Nawar Y. A.

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: We bought one to try out and then bought a 2nd one after we were comfortable using the 1st one. They work as described, easy to assemble and the quality seems pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Shyam Patkar

customer_reviews.title: Slightly dissatisfied and perhaps could be four stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought the reviews were great but the water pressure is not as easy to regulate as I would prefer. Also the instructions on how to install our terrible. We had the craziest experience of gushing water which was a little bit of a nightmare. Other than that, it really is a four star product. It gets the job done, and I’ve never had another one so I’ve nothing to compare it to.
customer_reviews.author: SungYun Lee

customer_reviews.title: Solid, all-metal, no leaks or drips...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this sprayer for nearly a year now- wanted to wait before writing a review. Thoroughly satisfied. Well made, all metal, super easy installation, no leaks or drips after use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: IndoJimbo

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable solution!
customer_reviews.text: This was as expected. It works great! The holder was too wide for my bowl but I put some adhesive moleskin on the back so it doesn't scrape. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I worked in the Middle East for better than 10 years
customer_reviews.text: I worked in the Middle East for better than 10 years. The hand held bidet is a commonly used item. I find the use is much more sanitary. Tissue is only used to dry off. The Aqua Nexis is designed to provide years of maintenance free usage. The installation was very quick requiring minimum tools. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than plastic bidet seat
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this product. Was expecting it to be harder to install but it took me literally 10 mins without using any tools or Teflon tape to install. Best part is that it looks good aesthetically, which I feel is not the case with the cheap bio-bidets attached to the plastic seats. Also, no leaks so far in one week.
customer_reviews.author: Mayank Bindal

customer_reviews.title: durable, easy to use. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I bought one 1.5 years ago and have been using it with no problems. No leaks, easy to use and very durable. I recently purchased two more for other family members.
customer_reviews.author: Hana A.

customer_reviews.title: Installation is pretty straight forward!
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning of receiving this product, I am worried about how to install it since I don't have any tool. Fortunately, it's really easy to install as what the product description said. No leak at all. I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: IChao Chen

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, great seller!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bidet, easy installation, took me less than 10 mins. I had received a faulty hose though, everything else was perfect so I wrote to the seller, got super quick response and he sent me another hose in like two days and it was all set!
customer_reviews.author: muks

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and quality materials. Water pressure is more than enough and somewhat adjustable. Will update in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Airborne85

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the sprayer, it was incredible! And I would have given it 5 stars. However, two months later, it started leaking from the connector just below the sprayer, right where the hose is connected. Definitely a design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Curly girl

customer_reviews.title: The sprayer works great, adjustable pressure is very effective for cleaning diaper
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer works great, adjustable pressure is very effective for cleaning diaper. Our first unit was faulty, and was promptly replaced. Very professional seller and sprayer is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to wash out diapers or any accidents right into the toilet. Strong water pressure thru nozzle. Easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Leaking from the Nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Within a month or so, started leaking even didn't used it once. Bought as a spare in case if run out of tissues, of no use now. Please do not buy any item, sold as used.
customer_reviews.author: Arvin

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan at all for my cloth diapers... not a lot of pressure. So much easier to dunk in the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Installation is easy and feel like good material. Hopefully it lasts long
customer_reviews.author: Duke360

customer_reviews.title: Works well and as described. Look for significantly cheaper versions available within Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Bidet works very well and doesn't leak. I've tried a few before and they all leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesotan!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is everything that they reported it to me and more. It was extremely easy to install and it works extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: David Cafarella

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to install and take off. Also it doesn’t leak at all. I repurchased this item 3 times it’s the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Zhq

customer_reviews.title: Use it for cloth diapers!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to spray my cloths diapers and really like it. Sometimes it occasionally leaks after use but I figure that it to be expected with this type of thing. I'm very happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: JKingsley

customer_reviews.title: Check out your toilet access before buying
customer_reviews.text: Well made product but hard to get at the valve to turn on and off! I couldn't use it on my toilet and had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Escondido !

customer_reviews.title: a must have for cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sprayer. My lo is breast fed but u still like to spray off the dirty diapers to prevent staining. I love how high powered this sprayer is takes the poop right off.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this for cloth diapering
customer_reviews.text: This sprayer is high quality. The parts are heavy metal and I think it will hold up for a while. It was easy to install with the instructions and works great on my diapers with a powerful spray.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Scott

customer_reviews.title: this is great. Could have more sharp jets
customer_reviews.text: this is great. Could have more sharp jets, but that might be personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: AWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3, and one broke just after return window ended
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the bidet works with a pressure mount that can be adjusted with a screw head. Unfortunately one out of 3 that I installed broke shortly after my return window ended. Other than that, easy to install. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: nivy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Adjusting the valve every time you use is a bit inconvenient, but overall it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Shreya Bhardwaj

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well but does leak on occasion if you aren't care fully about emptying the sprayer before shutting it off.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: 5 star and more
customer_reviews.text: Amazing service and product. I have been using this product for over a month now without any issue. I liked it so much that ended up buying for the second toilet as well. Thanks for the splendid service
customer_reviews.author: anu

product_meta.title: Aqua Nexis Handheld Bidet Sprayer for Toilet with the ONLY Bidet Grip, Also Best for Diaper Bathroom Water Cleaning - Stainless Steel, Guaranteed Not to Leak…
feature_bullets: GRIPPED BIDET - No more slipping and dropping the sprayer, a firm grip to have full control without any worry of messes

NOTHING ELSE TO BUY – INCLUDES ALL THE COMPONENTS you need to use it as a toilet sprayer for cloth diapers, Shattaf Muslim shower or personal hygiene device including lead-free brass T-Valve, Sprayer, Hose, Hook and Hanger (for wall or toilet side mounting) and teflon plumbers tape.

UNRIVALED CONTROL, UNBEATABLE COMFORT – Handheld bidet sprayer is easily connected to your toilets cool clean water flow OR an instant WARM WATER heater while ComfortFlow technology delivers the VARIABLE WATER PRESSURE CONTROL you need to feel fresh without any surprise

360 DEGREE PIVOTING NOZZLE – WON’T LEAK, SNARL OR TANGLE: Most hand held bidet spray toilet and cloth diaper sprayer models get tangled, missing the mark and spraying water all over your floor. Our diaper washer bidet combo has a 360 degree pivoting handle and NO-LEAK SEALS so it’s guaranteed to keep the water exactly where you direct it – and never where you don’t.

5 MINUTE INSTALL – 1 HOUR VIP CUSTOMER SERVICE: Bathroom handheld toilet sprayer has the EASIEST NO-TOOLS REQUIRED INSTALL – simply follow the step by step instructions and you’ll feel fresher and cleaner in no time. And if you ever have any questions simply drop us a message and we regularly respond with the answer you need within 1 hour.
